content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I want at least 2,000 Euros for the apartment. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get as much as I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are aiming high, Mr. Schmidt. However, I am a student and need to be mindful of my budget. I am willing to pay a fair price for the apartment, but 2,000 Euros seems quite steep for an unfurnished one-bedroom in the city center. Would you be open to considering a lower offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am open to negotiation, but I am not known for my generosity. Let's say, I could be convinced to go as low as 1,800 Euros. Remember, I am greedy and will try to get the most out of this situation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1,800 Euros is still quite high, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I must ask if you would consider a price closer to 1,500 Euros. This would be more in line with what I can afford as a student.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am willing to continue the negotiation, but I must warn you, I am not known for my fairness. Let's say, I could be convinced to go as low as 1,600 Euros. But I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get the most out of this situation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking to maximize your profit, Mr. Schmidt. 1,600 Euros is more reasonable, but I am still hopeful we can find a price that is fair for both parties. Would you be open to a counter-offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am always open to negotiation, but I am not known for my fairness. Let's say, I could be convinced to go as low as 1,550 Euros. Remember, I am greedy and will try to get the most out of this situation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1,550 Euros is closer to what I had in mind, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. Would you be willing to accept this price for the apartment?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1550] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mr. Schmidt! I am pleased to have reached an agreement with you. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
